1: @@//phyir//kun mchog sa yi dbang po nyid ni sbyor ba po//mtha' yas thob med thogs pa med pa'i <mistake>phyir //tshul</mistake> chen po yi <mistake>tshen</mistake> po thams cad kyi//mkha' dang 'dra <mistake>b'i</mistake> mchog gi dngos
2: <mistake>grub'phel</mistake> ba <mistake>sbyin//gnod</mistake> ma <mistake>phra</mistake> ma med pa gang dag gis//rdzogs <mistake>pbyed</mistake> med pa nus pa ma <mistake>yinno//sems</mistake> can le lo can dang nyung tsam 'dod pa dang //mi dad pa dang <mistake>gogsma</mistake> <mistake>pa</mistake> dang ma dag pa//
3: rtag tu rjes su chags dang chags bral dga' ba dang //de rnams phan pa'i don <mistake>tshogs</mistake> pa'i don <mistake>'de</mistake> yin no//gang gi khyim du <mistake>bzung</mistake> bar gang gis gyur <mistake>ba</mistake> dang //bdag gis ji ltar ston pa <mistake>bsgrub</mistake>
4: <mistake>/par</mistake> byed <mistake>pa 'am//mthu</mistake> yis thams cad so sor <mistake>mngo</mistake> du <mistake>yur</mistake> pa ste//dngos grub mchog gis rgyas pa'i las dag mi 'grub pa'o//gang gis grub pa rdo rje 'dzin zhes sogs pa <mistake>dang//gzugs</mistake>
5: sogs thams cad 'di la ji ltar mos pa bzhin//yi ge <mistake>hUM</mistake> yang <mistake>rji</mistake> ltar rab tu 'dod par bris byas na//des ni rang 'dod dngos grub cho <mistake>gbzhin</mistake> du 'thob//sems can don du las dag
6: byed pa ma yin pas//rgyal ba dag <mistake>gs</mistake> rnam par dag <mistake>pa'di</mistake> la ni//bgegs med de bzhin du ni bdud kyang med pa ste//rtog pa yis kyang dngos grub 'phel stobs byin gyis <mistake>robas//gang</mistake>
7: gis rtog pa mchog chen 'di sgrub byed pa <mistake>la //bdud</mistake> nyid du ni <mistake>ma</mistake> 'gro mi <mistake>brten</mistake> <mistake>pyid</mistake> kyang <mistake>men//brten</mistake> pa'i rgyu ni bdag gis ston par mi byed de//myur bar mchog gi mchog nyid 'grub
8: <mistake>/phyir</mistake> bstan par 'gyur byed <mistake>do //gang</mistake> gis bdag gi snying pos bdag la rtag tu grub byed ni//mchog <mistake>tshean</mistake> dngos grub dang ni rtag par bde <mistake>tshen</mistake> dang //chags dang <mistake>zhin</mistake> tu dga' dang brtan
